txt.en: Rumours tell of a great beast unlike any other. Deep in the Shield Isles it lies, preying on Corsairs and freebooters alike. Venture forth and try to tame the mighty beast.
'You've defeated Tarasâd! Come, let's get back to Umbar and give them the good news!'
Find and defeat Tarasâd, the Beast of Belfalas.
Defeated Tarasâd, the Beast of Belfalas
Tarasâd unleashes a bellow of rage!
Defeat Tarasâd, the Beast of Belfalas
